```{r load-packages, include=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(magrittr)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
```


```{r, echo=FALSE,}
table1<-readr::read_csv("table 1.csv", col_types = readr::cols())
```

#Appendix
```{r, echo=FALSE}
options(knitr.kable.NA = '')
table1%>%
knitr::kable(format = "latex", booktabs= T, caption= "Population Demographics")%>%
  kable_styling(latex_options = "striped", full_width = T)%>%  
  add_indent(c(3:12,14:23,25:27))%>%
  row_spec(2,13,24, bold = TRUE)
```
